implementation.name: XML Configuration Factory
implementation.description: Populates an OpenEjbConfiguration object based on the data from a single xml file conforming to the openejb_config.dtd.
implementation.detail: All configuration information is contained in one xml file
The xml file containing OpenEJB's configuration must conform the openejb_config.dtd
Deploying beans requires deployer to copy all data over to the OpenEJB xml file
Bean data is not validated prior to assembly
System structure is not validated prior to assembly
